title: Claridge - Great Cheeseman Park Location - Hardwood Flrs - Avail 10/7
posting_body: ['CLARIDGE (Cheeseman Park)', 'Denver Apartment For Rent', '(Capitol Hill - Denver)', '1412 E. 10th Ave.', 'Denver, 80218', 'Unit #4', 'Large 1 bedroom - 1 bath - 750 SqFt - 2nd floor unit', 'Beautiful quaint unit right at Cheesman Park', 'Open large living room with a walk-in closet several windows facing North/West that open up for a fresh breeze', 'Walk thru the arch entry into the dining room it would fit a good size table', 'Kitchen has a gas stove/oven and a med size refrigerator with a door leading to the courtyard', 'Very large bedroom (a King bed will fit nicely) and a good size closet', 'Another closet in the hall leading into the full bathroom you can open the window for a nice view and fresh air', 'Hardwood floors throughout the unit', 'High ceilings - Decorative fireplace - Lots of windows', 'Cat OK /', 'No Dogs', 'Residents pays unit elec plus building utilities', 'Laundry on-site/Storage-$20/mo/Year lease', 'Rent:  $1495/month   $1000/security deposit', 'Available: October 7th', 'Visit our website:', '<URL>', 'Brownstone Realty', '789 Sherman St 320', 'Denver, Co 80203', 'show contact info']
